properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters of Northern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 5:40AM AST until February 14 at 8:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...Rough and hazardous marine conditions will prevail until Friday...

.A surface high pressure across the central Atlantic will yield a
fresh to locally strong easterly wind flow across the regional
waters, creating hazardous marine conditions that will increase
through Friday.

* WHAT...Seas between 5 to 7 feet with occasional seas up to 9
feet. East winds between 15 to 20 knots with higher gusts.
Seas increasing to 6 to 8 feet with occasional seas up to 10
feet on Thursday.

* WHERE...Coastal waters of northern Puerto Rico.

* WHEN...Until 8 AM AST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM AST FRIDAY
